sourcesContent:
// components/InputData.js import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { residentsAPI } from '../services/api'; const InputData = ({ navigateTo }) => { const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(false); const [guardians, setGuardians] = useState([{ id: Date.now(), name: '', id_number: '', email: '', phone: '', relationship: '', address: '', is_primary: true }]); const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ // Data Pribadi name: '', type: 'Opa', age: '', gender: 'male', nik: '', birth_date: '', birth_place: '', religion: '', last_education: '', address: '', join_date: new Date().toISOString().split('T')[0], // Data Kesehatan condition: 'Sehat', blood_type: '', medical_history: '', allergies: '', smoking: 'Tidak', alcohol: 'Tidak', // Data Obat medication_status: 'Tidak', medication_type: '', medication_dosage: '', medication_schedule: '', // Pemeriksaan Hematologi hemoglobin: '', leukocyte: '', erythrocyte: '', // Data Gula Darah blood_sugar_random: '', blood_sugar_fasting: '', blood_sugar_two_hour: '', // Kondisi Fungsional functional_walking: 'Mandiri', functional_eating: 'Mandiri', functional_bathing: 'Mandiri', functional_dressing: 'Mandiri', functional_toileting: 'Mandiri', // Kondisi Mental & Emosi mental_emotion: 'Stabil', mental_consciousness: 'Compos Mentis', mental_cognitive: 'Baik', // Data Sosial Ekonomi previous_job: '', pension_status: 'Ya', pension_amount: '', health_insurance: 'Tidak', insurance_type: '', // Data Kontak Darurat (selain wali) emergency_contact_name: '', emergency_contact_phone: '', emergency_contact_relationship: '' }); const addGuardian = () => { setGuardians([...guardians, { id: Date.now(), name: '', id_number: '', email: '', phone: '', relationship: '', address: '', is_primary: false }]); }; const removeGuardian = (id) => { if (guardians.length > 1) { setGuardians(guardians.filter(guardian => guardian.id !== id)); } }; const updateGuardian = (id, field, value) => { setGuardians(guardians.map(guardian => guardian.id === id ? { ...guardian, [field]: value } : guardian )); }; const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData(prev => ({ ...prev, [name]: value })); }; const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); setIsLoading(true); try { // Prepare data for the API const residentData = { // Map form fields to database columns name: formData.name, type: formData.type, age: parseInt(formData.age), gender: formData.gender, birth_date: formData.birth_date, birth_place: formData.birth_place, address: formData.address, religion: formData.religion, join_date: formData.join_date, condition: formData.condition, medical_history: formData.medical_history, allergies: formData.allergies, smoking: formData.smoking, alcohol: formData.alcohol, functional_walking: formData.functional_walking, functional_eating: formData.functional_eating, mental_emotion: formData.mental_emotion, mental_consciousness: formData.mental_consciousness, // Additional data that needs to be stored in other tables additional_data: { nik: formData.nik, last_education: formData.last_education, blood_type: formData.blood_type, previous_job: formData.previous_job, pension_status: formData.pension_status, pension_amount: formData.pension_amount, health_insurance: formData.health_insurance, insurance_type: formData.insurance_type, emergency_contact: { name: formData.emergency_contact_name, phone: formData.emergency_contact_phone, relationship: formData.emergency_contact_relationship }, // Health records for separate tables hematology: { hemoglobin: formData.hemoglobin, leukocyte: formData.leukocyte, erythrocyte: formData.erythrocyte }, blood_sugar: { random: formData.blood_sugar_random, fasting: formData.blood_sugar_fasting, two_hour: formData.blood_sugar_two_hour }, // Medications for medications table medication: formData.medication_status === 'Ya' ? { medication_name: formData.medication_type, dosage: formData.medication_dosage, schedule: formData.medication_schedule, start_date: formData.join_date, status: 'Active' } : null }, guardians: guardians.filter(g => g.name.trim() !== '') }; await residentsAPI.create(residentData); alert('✅ Data penghuni berhasil disimpan!'); navigateTo('list'); } catch (error) { console.error('Error creating resident:', error); alert('❌ Gagal menyimpan data: ' + (error.error || 'Terjadi kesalahan')); } finally { setIsLoading(false); } }; return (

Form Input Data Oma & Opa

{/* ========== DATA PRIBADI ========== */}

Data Pribadi

{/* ========== DATA KESEHATAN ========== */}

Data Kesehatan

{/* ========== DATA OBAT ========== */}

Data Obat

{formData.medication_status === 'Ya' && ( <>
)}

Pemeriksaan Hematologi

{/* ========== DATA GULA DARAH ========== */}

Data Gula Darah

{/* ========== KONDISI FUNGSIONAL ========== */}

Kondisi Fungsional

{/* ========== KONDISI MENTAL & EMOSI ========== */}

Kondisi Mental & Emosi

{/* ========== DATA SOSIAL EKONOMI ========== */}

Data Sosial & Ekonomi

{formData.pension_status === 'Ya' && (
)}
{formData.health_insurance !== 'Tidak' && (
)}
{/* ========== DATA KONTAK DARURAT ========== */}

Kontak Darurat (selain wali)

{/* ========== DATA WALI ========== */}
{guardians.map((guardian, index) => (
Data Wali {index + 1}
{guardians.length > 1 && ( )}
updateGuardian(guardian.id, 'name', e.target.value)} placeholder="Nama lengkap wali" required disabled={isLoading} />
updateGuardian(guardian.id, 'id_number', e.target.value)} placeholder="16 digit NIK" disabled={isLoading} />
updateGuardian(guardian.id, 'phone', e.target.value)} placeholder="081234567890" required disabled={isLoading} />
updateGuardian(guardian.id, 'email', e.target.value)} placeholder="email@contoh.com" disabled={isLoading} />
updateGuardian(guardian.id, 'relationship', e.target.value)} placeholder="Contoh: Anak, Saudara, Keponakan" disabled={isLoading} />
updateGuardian(guardian.id, 'is_primary', e.target.checked)} disabled={isLoading} />
))}
{/* ========== BUTTONS ========== */}
); }; export default InputData;
